short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically generates Markdowns from GitLab and Github tags.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically generates README from GitLab and Github tags.

ğŸš€ The Readme generator from Tags is a Google Chrome extension that automatically generates a MARKDOWN file from the tags of a Gitlab and Github repository. The README file is formatted in a standard format, with each tag version listed as a header, and the commit messages for that version listed as bullet points.

ğŸŒŸ Features:
Easy to use
Generates a MARKDOWN file in a standard format and can be personalized
Supports all Gitlab and Github repositories
Can generate the MARKDOWN file between the paginations of the tags page in Gitlab
Can format any text entered through parameters
The result is automatically copied to the clipboard

ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’» How to use:
Install the Readme generator from Tags extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Go to the tags feed of a Gitlab or Github repository.
If needed:
Enter the last tag that you see in the file
Change the bullet point
Include the title
Click the "Generate README" button. ğŸ”„

Happy coding! ğŸš€ğŸ’»âœ¨
